channel.title: cats on Errata
channel.description: Recent content in cats on Errata

item.title: Adventures of FartBot
item.description: A robot approaches cats while meowing and farting

item.title: Strange photos of playing cats
item.description: I went through old cat photos and found sound funny ones.

item.title: Eating habits of cats
item.description: My cats have a system for sharing food with one another. One also developed a way of telling us it’s finished eating. Here’s a short video showing all of these things.

item.title: Confectionery cat
item.description: For the 2017 catlendar we dressed our cat in a confectionery costume floating in space. It’s cute.

item.title: 2021 cat calendar
item.description: With the lockdown we haven’t been able to distribute physical copies of our 2021 catlendar. Here’s an electronic version made with Python.

item.title: Graceful cat flop
item.description: A photo gallery of a cat in laying on its back.

item.title: A bird tries to eat a sleeping cat
item.description: A bird of prey tried to eat my cat but crashed against the window instead. I tried to identify it, but I’m not sure.

item.title: Cat relaxing in a funny pose
item.description: A cat sleeping in a way that makes it look like it’s walking.

item.title: Various cat pictures
item.description: I took photos of my cats sleeping and sneaking under the couch.
